info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:35PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lea County through 515 PM MDT... At 434 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crossroads, or 14 miles north of Tatum, moving east at 30 mph. Another strong thunderstorm was located about five miles west of Tatum, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tatum, Gladiola and Tatum Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
